tailwind

Typography

Typography

The theme.fontFamily section of your tailwind.config.js file allows you to override Tailwind's default fontFamily.

For more information see: Tailwind Documentation

Font Family

Class
Properties
Sample
.font-sans -apple-system BlinkMacSystemFont "Segoe UI" Roboto "Helvetica Neue" Arial "Noto Sans" sans-serif "Apple Color Emoji" "Segoe UI Emoji" "Segoe UI Symbol" "Noto Color Emoji"

.font-serif Georgia Cambria "Times New Roman" Times serif

.font-mono Menlo Monaco Consolas "Liberation Mono" "Courier New" monospace

Font Size (Tailwind documentation)

Class Properties
.text-xs 0.75rem
.text-sm 0.875rem
.text-base 1rem
.text-lg 1.125rem
.text-xl 1.25rem
.text-2xl 1.5rem
.text-3xl 1.875rem
.text-4xl 2.25rem
.text-5xl 3rem
.text-6xl 4rem

Font Weight (Tailwind documentation)

Class Properties
.font-hairline 100
.font-thin 200
.font-light 300
.font-normal 400
.font-medium 500
.font-semibold 600
.font-bold 700
.font-extrabold 800
.font-black 900

Letter Spacing (Tailwind documentation)

Class Properties
.tracking-tighter -0.05em
.tracking-tight -0.025em
.tracking-normal 0
.tracking-wide 0.025em
.tracking-wider 0.05em
.tracking-widest 0.1em

Samples

.tracking-tighter

The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog.

.tracking-normal

Line Height (Tailwind documentation)

Class Properties
.leading-none 1
.leading-tight 1.25
.leading-snug 1.375
.leading-normal 1.5
.leading-relaxed 1.625
.leading-loose 2

Spacing

Customizing Spacing

The theme.spacing section of your tailwind.config.js file allows you to override Tailwind's default spacing/sizing scale.

For more information see: Tailwind Documentation

Padding (Tailwind documentation)

Class Padding
.p-0 0
.p-1 0.25rem
.p-2 0.5rem
.p-3 0.75rem
.p-4 1rem
.p-5 1.25rem
.p-6 1.5rem
.p-8 2rem
.p-10 2.5rem
.p-12 3rem
.p-16 4rem
.p-20 5rem
.p-24 6rem
.p-32 8rem
.p-40 10rem
.p-48 12rem
.p-56 14rem
.p-64 16rem
.p-px 1px
// tailwind.config.js
module.exports = {
theme: {
padding: {
    "0": "0",
    "1": "0.25rem",
    "2": "0.5rem",
    "3": "0.75rem",
    "4": "1rem",
    "5": "1.25rem",
    "6": "1.5rem",
    "8": "2rem",
    "10": "2.5rem",
    "12": "3rem",
    "16": "4rem",
    "20": "5rem",
    "24": "6rem",
    "32": "8rem",
    "40": "10rem",
    "48": "12rem",
    "56": "14rem",
    "64": "16rem",
    "px": "1px"
}
}
}

Borders

Borders

The theme.border section of your tailwind.config.js file allows you to override Tailwind's default spacing/sizing scale.

For more information see: Tailwind Documentation

Border Color

Class
Properties
text-transparent color: transparent
 
text-black color: #000
 
text-white color: #fff
 
border-gray-100 color: #f7fafc
 
border-gray-200 color: #edf2f7

border-gray-400 color: #cbd5e0
 
border-gray-500 color: #a0aec0

Border Width (Tailwind documentation)

Class Properties
.border-0 0
.border-2 2px
.border-4 4px
.border-8 8px
.border-default 1px

Breakpoints

Breakpoints

You define your project's breakpoints in the theme.screens section of your tailwind.config.js file.

For more information see: Tailwind Documentation
